## PluginRegistry.findInputProcessorsForExtension() method

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Find input processors that handle a specific file extension.

**Signature:**

```typescript
findInputProcessorsForExtension(extension: string): ReadonlyArray<ResolvedCapability<InputProcessorDefinition>>;
```

</th><th>

extension

</td><td>

File extension including dot (e.g., '.ts', '.graphql')


</td></tr>

ReadonlyArray&lt;[ResolvedCapability](./change-detector-core.resolvedcapability.md)<!-- -->&lt;[InputProcessorDefinition](./change-detector-core.inputprocessordefinition.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;
